quality_assessment: Documentation file does not exist - SUMMARY.md references a multi-subsection chapter structure that hasn't been created yet

issues.description: The subsection file 'book/src/troubleshooting/context-providers.md' referenced in SUMMARY.md does not exist. The troubleshooting chapter has been restructured in SUMMARY.md as a multi-subsection chapter with index.md and separate files for each topic, but the directory and files haven't been created yet.
issues.fix_suggestion: Create the troubleshooting/ directory structure with subsections extracted from the existing troubleshooting.md file. The context-providers.md subsection should contain the 'Context Provider Troubleshooting' section content (currently lines 555-686 of troubleshooting.md) plus relevant content from context-providers.md (lines 842-946).

issues.description: All 7 links in SUMMARY.md referencing the troubleshooting/ directory are broken because the directory doesn't exist. Links affected: troubleshooting/index.md, troubleshooting/quick-fixes.md, troubleshooting/debug-mode.md, troubleshooting/context-providers.md, troubleshooting/advanced-analysis.md, troubleshooting/error-messages.md, troubleshooting/output-issues.md, troubleshooting/faq.md
issues.fix_suggestion: Create the troubleshooting/ directory and all subsection files, or revert SUMMARY.md to reference the single troubleshooting.md file

issues.description: SUMMARY.md has been updated to reflect a multi-subsection chapter structure for troubleshooting, but the actual migration of content hasn't been completed. The original troubleshooting.md (2554 lines) contains all the content that should be split into the subsections.
issues.fix_suggestion: Complete the migration by: 1) Creating book/src/troubleshooting/ directory, 2) Creating index.md from intro sections, 3) Creating quick-fixes.md from 'Quick Fixes' section, 4) Creating debug-mode.md from 'Debug Mode' section, 5) Creating context-providers.md from 'Context Provider Troubleshooting' section, 6) Creating advanced-analysis.md from 'Advanced Analysis Troubleshooting' section, 7) Creating error-messages.md from 'Error Messages Reference' section, 8) Creating output-issues.md from output-related content, 9) Creating faq.md from 'FAQ' section

content_sources.description: Contains existing context provider troubleshooting content including enabling context, disabling providers, git history issues, dependency issues, critical path issues, and debug guidance
Contains detailed troubleshooting for context providers including git history analysis slow, incorrect role classification, context providers not available, and common issues

positive_aspects: Comprehensive context provider troubleshooting content already exists in source files
Content is well-structured and includes practical examples
Both conceptual explanations and command-line solutions provided
Content covers all three context providers (critical_path, dependency, git_history)
improvement_suggestions: Create the troubleshooting/ directory structure to match SUMMARY.md
Extract and consolidate context provider troubleshooting from both source files
Add cross-references between context-providers.md and the new troubleshooting subsection
Deduplicate content that appears in both source files
Update links in other documentation files to point to new structure

metadata.validation_focus: Check context provider troubleshooting is complete
